evidence.claim: Utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure and hosting services.
Complies with HIPAA regulations for health data security.
Implements FHIR standards for interoperability in health data exchange.
Engages in EDI transactions as part of claims processing.
Mentions Google Cloud Platform (GCP) in their engineering talent search.

icp.icp_reason: Company operates in healthcare data exchange, indicating strong need for X12 transactions.
